thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 2 of 193
thread.title: Lianna LeBarron

author: Lianna LeBarron
title: Lianna LeBarron
text:
I really like that the site is easy to navigate. The added feature of explaining how to create the best job posting is great! I also like that there are "interview" questions that you can post for each job.
It would be nice to have a couple of filtering options, such as the candidates having to live in the immediate area or provide a personal resume.
